summary: A return-statement causes execution to exit the invocation of a function.
details: If the enclosing function is a generator-function, then the generator will be reset.
If the enclosing function is a memoized-function, then memoization will occur.
static-checks: The type of the value must be either a primitive-type or a reference-type.
The type of the value must be assignable to the return-type of the enclosing function.
